data.title: Horrible and filthy!!!!👎
data.text: This place was HORRIBLE!! Cracks in the walls, roaches everywhere even in the bed!! It was disgusting!! The room smelled like mold ( which ironically im allergic to) the bed sheets and towels looked like they haven't been changed in weeks!! But fortunately i brought my own sheets and towels so i just put them over the whole bed and toughed it out until morning had to be to work early so i just stayed😫😪😤😴

data.title: NEVER stay here!
data.text: This place was horrible from the start! The front desk lady during the night shift was very rude. I feel like she put me in this crappy room on purpose. I walked in and the place had a funky musty odor. Once I walked in the bathroom, I saw the cause of it. There's a 4 foot long streak of brown mold running down the wall. Then, I noticed the entire floor was soaking wet. The bathtub faucet pours constantly,there's huge holes in the room wall, and the air conditioner is very loud. I asked for a king sized bed, but I got a double, but of course, that's the least of my worries! I asked for another room and the person at the desk told me I have to wait until someone checks out of one of the others. I don't see why since this place barely has anyone here. I paid $60 for one night and the rest of this morning and I could have gotten a cleaner, better kept room at the Siesta lodge down the road for $42! Never, ever, again will I come here!

data.title: Scary
data.text: The last review said it all. I was afraid to walk outside my room. I've never had to stand outside of a window because the front doors were sealed off, to pay for a room meanwhile crackheads are watching me and stalking me as I walk to my room. The lady at the front desk was nice but couldn't figure out the printer. Only one channel on TV and I was scared to touch anything in the room. I was so tired I just stayed so I could pick up my car in storage at 11.

data.title: Should be called the STAY HOME LODGE!!
data.text: Oh, where to start? First of all, crackheads everywhere. They kept knocking on my door. Also, this room was sooooooo nasty and dirty that I refused to touch anything in the room and ended up leaving and not even spending the night that I paid for. Better to drive home exhausted in the middle of the night, than to stay here and be on the "film at 11" on the local news. Towels all stained, something smeared all over the front of the minifridge. TERRIBLE! Granted, the room was only $45 for the night, including tax, but that's seriously $40 too much! The only positive was the young lady running the desk was very polite.
